resources.string: Activation code has been sent to your mobile and email-address. Please enter the code to complete registration.
Entered code has expired. New activation code has been sent to your mobile and email-address. Please enter the new code to complete registration.
Entered code was invalid. Please enter valid code or click on "Resend Code"
Activation code has been re-sent to your mobile and email-address. Please enter the code to complete registration.
If you received an activation code to connect to an Organization, please enter it here.
Another user is connected with the mobile number provided
Mobile number not found for any organisation
